Cases.SQL: select * from (select row_number() over (order by b) as rownumber from t) DT where rownumber <= 1 -- applicable with no partition by
Plan: └─Window 10000.00 mpp[tiflash]  row_number()->Column#4 over(order by test.t.b rows between current row and current row)

Cases.SQL: select * from (select row_number() over (partition by b) as rownumber from t) DT where rownumber <= 1 -- applicable with partition by but no push down to tiflash
Plan: └─Window 10000.00 mpp[tiflash]  row_number()->Column#4 over(partition by test.t.b rows between current row and current row), stream_count: 8
└─ExchangeSender 10000.00 mpp[tiflash]  ExchangeType: HashPartition, Compression: FAST, Hash Cols: [name: test.t.b, collate: binary], stream_count: 8

Cases.SQL: select * from (select row_number() over (partition by b order by a) as rownumber from t) DT where rownumber <= 1 -- applicable with partition by and order by but no push down to tiflash
Plan: └─Window 10000.00 mpp[tiflash]  row_number()->Column#4 over(partition by test.t.b order by test.t.a rows between current row and current row), stream_count: 8
└─ExchangeSender 10000.00 mpp[tiflash]  ExchangeType: HashPartition, Compression: FAST, Hash Cols: [name: test.t.b, collate: binary], stream_count: 8

Cases.SQL: select * from (select row_number() over (partition by a) as rownumber from t) DT where rownumber <= 3 -- pattern is not applicable with partition by not prefix of PK
